scripts.android:clean: EXPO_PUBLIC_USE_MOCK=false npm run watchman:del && npm run clean:android && npm run prebuild:clean && npx expo run:android
scripts.ios:clean: EXPO_PUBLIC_USE_MOCK=false npm run watchman:del && npm run clean:ios && npm run prebuild:clean && npx expo run:ios
scripts.release:android:apk: npm run build:android:apk && mkdir -p releases/android-versions/apk && cp android/app/build/outputs/apk/release/app-release.apk releases/android-versions/apk/bytebank-$(date +%Y%m%d-%H%M%S).apk && echo 'APK copiado para releases/android-versions/apk/'
scripts.release:android:apk:versioned: npm run build:android:apk && mkdir -p releases/android-versions/apk && cp android/app/build/outputs/apk/release/app-release.apk releases/android-versions/apk/bytebank-v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version")-$(date +%Y%m%d-%H%M%S).apk && echo 'APK versionado copiado para releases/android-versions/apk/'
scripts.build:ios:app:sim: xcodebuild -workspace ios/bytebank.xcworkspace -scheme bytebank -sdk iphonesimulator -configuration Debug -derivedDataPath ios/build clean build
scripts.build:ios:archive: xcodebuild -workspace ios/bytebank.xcworkspace -scheme bytebank -configuration Release -destination 'generic/platform=iOS' -archivePath ios/build/bytebank.xcarchive clean archive -allowProvisioningUpdates
scripts.build:ios:release: npm run build:ios:archive && npm run build:ios:export
scripts.config:set: npx dotenv -e .env -- npx expo config --type public
scripts.clean: rm -rf .expo .expo-shared node_modules .turbo dist && npm install && npx expo install
scripts.clean:ios: rm -rf ios/Pods ios/build && (cd ios && pod deintegrate && pod install) && rm -rf ~/Library/Developer/Xcode/DerivedData/*
scripts.clean:android: cd android && ./gradlew clean && cd .. && rm -rf android/app/build android/.gradle
scripts.reset:all: npm run watchman:del || true && npm run cache:metro && npm run clean:deps && npm run prebuild:clean && npm run clean:ios && npm run clean:android
scripts.start:clean: npm run reset:all && npx expo install && npx expo prebuild --clean -y && npx expo run ios
